desc: This book shows you how to get the most from the ASP.NET data presentation controls to easily display and manage complex data in your web applications. This book takes you through the most important tasks for working with the ASP.NET data presentation controls. Packed with example code and clear explanations, this book will make you a master of these controls in no time.This book is for ASP.NET developers who want to display or manage data in ASP.NET applications. The code examples are in C#.
title: ASP.NET Data Presentation Controls Essentials: Master the standard ASP.NET server controls for displaying and managing data
